snippet.title: Company must-have: an overarching big data framework
snippet.description: Mary Shacklett explores the importance of having a big data and analytics framework, whether it's in-house, pre-packaged, or a combination of technologies and methods.

snippet.title: Wearables have a dirty little secret: 50% of users lose interest
snippet.description: There's a little-known fact about wearables that manufacturers don't advertise to consumers: Most people lose interest within a few months.

snippet.title: Red e App offers private mobile messaging for non-desk workers, protects internal communication
snippet.description: Private messaging app Red e App targets the non-desk workforce, showing that the message itself isn't as important as the message data.

snippet.title: Survey: Tablets in the workplace - hot or not?
